TopicTitle: Support for the Orlando shooting victims

Articles.Content:
I don't know if this is appropriate... I guess I don't care.  
For those of you that haven't heard yet, there was a brutal and horrific shooting at a nightclub in Orlando, Florida last night.  

The last count was 50 dead and over 50 wounded.   

I don't want to get political about this... I just want to post something to show support and solidarity for the victims and their families.

Thank you

 

Edited June 12, 2016 by Just Jim
Yeah. All because of a lifestyle.
I live in Ontario and I am deeply sorry for the people who ere killed and their loved ones

2 hours ago, GDJ said:

Yeah. All because of a lifestyle.

I would not call it a lifestyle, but what you are. Even though it seems the killer could have picked anyone that bothered him.

[snip]

 

On topic: My condolences to the victims and their families.

just saying is a recurrent/recursive query amongst gaming forums all over the net ...

it might sound cold but in fact ... it might be the revert exponential a lot that just my way to express it as a "lite autist" http://www.worldometers.info/ even when i don't open this page, i rarely don't think about this numbers and the details i do recommand you don't follow that link for your sanity especially regarding the details sorting

Edited June 13, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
Hmmm.... Seven News hasn't put this up yet AFAIK (just shows how much info gets to Australia from the time difference) but... God that is really sad. 50 people dead...

20 hours ago, Camacha said:

I would not call it a lifestyle, but what you are. Even though it seems the killer could have picked anyone that bothered him.

It had nothing to do with that. The shooter swore allegiance to a certain 'group.'

9 minutes ago, vger said:

... The shooter swore allegiance to ...

result the shooter shooted per allegiance to ... something ... *grumpf*

the sole thing it remind me is neanderthal tribes behaviour without earth picture from space to remind them they walk on the same rock 

-20 000/-50 000 <=> 1950 yipeee ... happy birthday earth frontiers, happy birthday, all king queen and emperor, and there little feodal that fart around ... [insert nowdays equivalent if you feel the need, i personnaly don't]

#notproudtobeabiped

Edited June 13, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''

It's a horrible thing to have happened.

I have other thoughts on the subject, but they're not appropriate for the forum.

The best thing any individual can do in response to this is keep living your life, and keep seeking happiness.  And give someone a hug today.  It won't save the world, but it certainly won't hurt.

6 hours ago, pxi said:

And give someone a hug today.  It won't save the world, but it certainly won't hurt.

If everyone did this seriously every day, the world would be orders of magnitude better.

I live just a couple hours from there, it's really sickening someone would shoot people down based on their sexual preferences, my condolences to the friends and families of those who were killed or wounded

Please, everyone... I ask this not turn political!  
The reason I posted it is because I live not far from Orlando, and I'm there a lot, and to be it feels to me like the victims were my neighbors.

1 minute ago, Just Jim said:

Please, everyone... I ask this not turn political!  
The reason I posted it is because I live not far from Orlando, and I'm there a lot, and to be it feels to me like the victims were my neighbors.

Are you? Same here. Needless to say, I live not to far from there and I have a relative who has to travel there to work so D: ! Fellow Floridian stay safe!!!!

1 minute ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Are you? Same here. Needless to say, I live not to far from there and I have a relative who has to travel there to work so D: ! Fellow Floridian stay safe!!!!

I'm just north of Tampa, less than 2 hours from there.  I've been to Orlando more times than I can remember.  With Disney and Universal and all the rest, it's an amazing and beautiful place to visit.

9 minutes ago, Just Jim said:

I'm just north of Tampa, less than 2 hours from there.  I've been to Orlando more times than I can remember.  With Disney and Universal and all the rest, it's an amazing and beautiful place to visit.

I'm central Florida and I've been to Disney all the time so I know it well.

if I can help with any Orlando efforts your leading let me know, I was running a IRC chat yesterday so I'm trying.
Bruh, the feels. I'm neutral about the whole gay issue but shootings on anyone with a specific belief is horrible. My condolences to the families.

My thoughts go out to the victims and their families.

//

A large number of posts has been removed from this thread because of politics. Please keep that part of the discussion away from this forum.

3 minutes ago, ZooNamedGames said:

I'm central Florida and I've been to Disney all the time so I know it well.

if I can help with any Orlando efforts your leading let me know, I was running a IRC chat yesterday so I'm trying.

I'm not starting any myself.  I wish I could, but I'm too old and on disability.  

But I've already seen some wonderful images and video of vigils and blood donating drives all over the state.  
Word has it in Orlando there were lines of people wanting to donate blood that wrapped around city blocks.

Just now, Just Jim said:

I'm not starting any myself.  I wish I could, but I'm too old and on disability.  

But I've already seen some wonderful images and video of vigils and blood donating drives all over the state.  
Word has it in Orlando there were lines of people wanting to donate blood that wrapped around city blocks.

No ones too old- and some of the best charitable things can be done for no cash, but full spirit... Like running an IRC for those who need to just talk about it. Just pass word around and we can restart that.

I have no doubts- tragedies like that can rebond the community. It's amazing.

life is sweet ... i don't watch the infos and news since a few year so i can focus on finding back the will to eat and sleep wich tend to miss me ...
(lot of trouble to get appetite and to sleep but because sometime body is exhausted more than the mind yo do sort of)

so after orlando event i watched the news 3 link later ... http://news.aniamey.com/ ... cool 50 000 person on the road there ... silly planet ... silly biped : / : / : /

http://news.aniamey.com/h/73178.html

then i turned off the news, because well stayin awake 36 48++ hour on a regular basis is already enough for my brain ... not like i need more blood in the eyes than i already have permanently ...

Edited June 13, 2016 by WinkAllKerb''
